effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! reducing the cooldown of Combustion by 2 sec. Casting Combustion always hits a Jackpot! at 200% increased effectiveness.
Set: When you hit a Jackpot! your damage is increased by 15% for 7 sec. If you would gain Jackpot! from Combustion the duration is increased by 100%.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: ...then you heal up to 5 injured allies for 182,194.

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 894 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 894 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 1 million Fire damage split between nearby enemies.
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.
Use: Zap yourself for 249,641 Nature damage, gaining 16,473 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
